title: Cluster Governance Schema
description: Defines governance rules for an OV Cluster.

id.description: The DID of the cluster governance document.

cluster.description: The DID of the cluster this governance applies to.

verificationMethod.description: The method used to verify new nodes joining the cluster.

removalPolicy.description: Conditions under which nodes can be removed from the cluster.

nodeManagement.description: Rules for adding and removing nodes in the cluster.

allowedServices.description: List of service types permitted in this cluster (e.g., Storage, Verification, Payment).

serviceVerification.description: Reference to a DID-Linked Resource explaining service verification requirements.

serviceManagement.description: Governance rules for services running in the cluster.

auditFrequency.description: How frequently the cluster undergoes audits.

complianceChecks.description: Reference to a DID-Linked Resource detailing compliance requirements.

securityPolicies.description: Security and compliance policies for the cluster.

governanceModel.description: The governance model used to manage this cluster.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when this governance document was issued.
